text: It seems there are two kinds of drinkers: Those who can hold their whiskey, savor it, hell, feel more astute afterwards, and then there are those who start falling down and singing shanties after a mere couple sips of good old Ezra. I am thankful to be in the prior category. It means that I am a Man.

name: carrollhach
text:
Love Ray's spirit, but he's flat wrong on this one. I assume he's talking to Beef because Beef is most always right. From the [url=http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=whiskey dick]Urban Dic(k)tionary:[/url]
Whiskey Dick:


When too much alcohol has been consumed into a males body making it impossible to achieve an erection even in circumstances where it would be almost impossible not to.

Parker almost got his dick sucked last weekend but had Whiskey Dick. Later in the night he did state that "It is working."

name: nonorganon
text: Ray is forgetting the distinction between the "drinking eight or nine bourbons neat" and "pouring Old Crow into Pabst pounders". The former is what he thinks it means while the latter is the standard convention, they are simultaneously true. However, the latter also happens to be what the one that happens most often in the most crucial years for getting your bone on, your 20s.

name: fineoakstructure
text: While I agree with Ray in the last sentence, I still can't help but think there's a better way to announce your abilities than "rock[ing] a whiskey dick all night."  What Ray describes was not my first impression.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Well, Ray's certainly dead wrong on the definition of "whiskey dick", but alcohol does have some unpredictable sexual side-effects sometimes. I think it'd be pretty unusual for it to facilitate getting an erection, unless it's suppressing your performance anxiety or something like that. A little booze before a roll in the hay is well-known as a cheap and fun treatment of premature ejaculation, though. But you have to be... [IMGS OFF]
